meta.description: Tens of millions of Americans believe QAnon's core — and false — theory that an evil cabal of Satan-worshipping elites commits atrocities against children and controls much of the world. Where does this movement stand and who has it impacted? Lesley Stahl reports.

title: Watch 60 Minutes: QAnon's corrosive impact on the U.S. - Full show on CBS
cleaned_text: QAnon's corrosive impact on the U.S.
